about_the_game:
Any questions: PinkPeachStudio@hotmail.com

The necromancer employs forbidden spells and plays with lives.
She conducts terrifying experiments hiding in the forest.

It is rumored that she was once a Holy Lady of the church
but murdered numerous people and disappeared with their corpses.

A certain group of rookie adventurers is on a mission to get and provide
information about the hidden necromancer. While Emily and her comrades
investigate around the forest, she is separated from them when confronted by an enemy.
Losing herself in the forest, she tries to find an escape looking for the comrades.

Step by step assassination
There are strong enemies before, and there are followers. Explore the enemy's route, defeat the enemy with a limited assassination, and escape to the next scene.

Discover hidden plots
There are many hidden diaries in the game, collect these pieces and discover the hidden stories behind the Necromancer.

Complicated and sophisticated puzzles
We have designed a large number of level puzzles. Solve the puzzle and escape from the layers of the Necromancer trap!

Agitated monster chasing
The monster is chasing you! How to do! With the thrill of the music, escape the monster's claws!

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains a lighter level of nudity and pornography. And a certain level of violence.

detailed_description:
Any questions: PinkPeachStudio@hotmail.com

The necromancer employs forbidden spells and plays with lives.
She conducts terrifying experiments hiding in the forest.

It is rumored that she was once a Holy Lady of the church
but murdered numerous people and disappeared with their corpses.

A certain group of rookie adventurers is on a mission to get and provide
information about the hidden necromancer. While Emily and her comrades
investigate around the forest, she is separated from them when confronted by an enemy.
Losing herself in the forest, she tries to find an escape looking for the comrades.

There are strong enemies before, and there are followers. Explore the enemy's route, defeat the enemy with a limited assassination, and escape to the next scene.

name: ~necromancy~Emily's Escape

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 recommended

short_description: [~necromancy~Emily's Escape] is a 2D ACT game.Use your wisdom to escape the Necromancer's claws in intense battles and chases. Tell the Adventures Guild about the news of the death of the Necromancer!Can you crack the conspiracy of the Necromancer? Fight now!
supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
